name: Squiangle (Zaynoxi)
description:
Note: if you plan to play the game with a controller, it is preferable to download the game.

square + triangle = squiangle

Red. Green. Blue.

You are a square, your goal is simple: collect triangles of your color and avoid others, some power-ups might come in handy.

How to play?

At the beginning of every game, a color is assigned to you among red, green, or blue. Collect triangles of your color and avoid others. You start the game with 10 lives, you lose one each time you touch a triangle of another color.

You can choose from four difficulty levels on the main menu.

Power up

Touch a power-up to collect it, press the corresponding button to use it. You can collect up to 9 of each power-up.

Bomb

or

Explode every triangle, you gain points for every triangle of your color.

Ghost

or

You become transparent. Triangles of other colors don't make you lose lives but you continue to collect those of your color.

Star

or

You can collect any triangles, no matter the color

Clock

or

Slow down the speed of the triangles.

Heart

Give you back a life
Unlike others power-ups, the heart is used when you touch it.

Controls
  • Move: * or (Left stick)
  • Use a power-up:     or    

*Keys are automatically adapted to your keyboard layout.

If you plan to play the game with a controller, it is preferable to download the game.
